channel.title: list pools on SiriDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in list pools on SiriDB documentation

item.title: columns
item.description: Valid columns are: pool: Returns the pool ID. series: Number of series in the pool. servers: Number of servers in the pool. When no columns are provided the default is used. (pool, servers, series) Examples # list pools with more than 1000 series list pools where series>1000 #list all series by pool and series list pools pool, series
